movie.title: The Girl from the Song
movie.description_intro: A young musician travels to Burning Man, a unique event in the middle of the Nevada desert, in an attempt to get back the impetuous girl he has fallen in love with.
movie.description_full: A young musician travels to Burning Man, a unique event in the middle of the Nevada desert, in an attempt to get back the impetuous girl he has fallen in love with.

movies.title: Daiamondo wa kizutsukanai
movies.summary: A college student becomes romantically involved with a married middle-aged teacher.
movies.description_full: A college student becomes romantically involved with a married middle-aged teacher.
movies.synopsis: A college student becomes romantically involved with a married middle-aged teacher.

movies.title: Urgency
movies.summary: Tony is in a race against time to save his kidnapped wife before she is murdered but as he unravels the mystery behind her abduction he discovers they are after more than money.
movies.description_full: Tony is in a race against time to save his kidnapped wife before she is murdered but as he unravels the mystery behind her abduction he discovers they are after more than money.
movies.synopsis: Tony is in a race against time to save his kidnapped wife before she is murdered but as he unravels the mystery behind her abduction he discovers they are after more than money.

movies.title: Caravan to Vaccares
movies.summary: American Neil Bowman is traveling through France when he meets British photographer Lila. They are hired by French land owner Duc de Croyter to escort a Hungarian scientist to New York. But they soon realize that the job is not a cushy number, and have to deal with a gang of kidnappers who will stop at nothing to get their hands on the scientist.

movies.title: The Party's Just Beginning
movies.summary: In a bleak Inverness midwinter, Luisaidh is careering off the rails after the suicide of her best friend. She medicates her misery with joyless sex, chips and a belief in the power of positive drinking. Surrounded by bittersweet memories, she struggles to find someone to talk to or some reason to make life worthwhile at the most stressful time of the year.
